page.title: 13LIVING IN ELTON:NORTH/ELTON
page.content:
We asked what people saw as the advantages and disadvantages of living where they did.
The overwhelming opinion is that Elton is a quiet, beautiful village set in attractive countryside with very friendly inhabitants. Some people found the lack of shops in the village a disadvantage, but the ease of travelling to the large shopping centre in Peterborough was seen to counteract this. Some people found the distances they had to travel to work a disadvantage, the bus service was seen as poor - and others were against any further building expansion.
However, most people could find no disadvantages with their situation.
